mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Customer ( customerId, name, phoneNumber, totalSales, isInstant, totalCredit, totalDeposit, isDelivery, phoneNumber2, buildingId, address, isBlack, isDeleted, creationDate, modificationDate ) VALUES ( #{CustomerId}, #{Name}, #{PhoneNumber}, #{TotalSales}, #{IsInstant}, #{TotalCredit}, #{TotalDeposit}, #{IsDelivery}, #{PhoneNumber2}, #{BuildingId}, #{Addr}, #{IsBlack}, #{IsDeleted}, #{CreationDate}, #{MDate} )

INSERT INTO MemberDriver ( memberDriverId, name, phoneNumber, isDeleted, creationDate, modificationDate ) VALUES ( #{MemberDriverId}, #{Name}, #{PhoneNumber}, #{IsDeleted}, #{CreationDate}, #{ModificationDate} )
